gust.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a sudden strong movement of wind, air, rain etc
gust.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: A sudden gust of wind blew the door shut.
Gusts of up to 200 kph may be experienced.
gust.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: if the wind gusts, it blows strongly with sudden short movements
gust.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: winds gusting at up to 45 miles per hour
